Name: Abfense
About the game: The peace and quiet of everyday life will be dispelled like an illusion after the appearance of a mysterious stranger on the tail with an enemy army. Unpredictable circumstances, interesting puzzles and situations that can change the course of events in a split second, go through a difficult path in this struggle for your own home and freedom. Tower Defense Build, upgrade, and take part directly in first-person battles. Destroy waves of enemies that are coming at you. Puzzle levels Not only destroy enemies, but also complete puzzles to advance further in the story. Boss battle Fight your enemy one-on-one. Defeat him and protect your home.
